website_summaries.verdict: A useful and stylish gift that your guests will actually use.
pros: Plastic glasses feel durable, but sit at a reasonable price point
Simple, sleek design can be worn everyday
Lenses are dark, perfect for blocking out the sun the next morning
cons: Some glasses may arrive with the lenses out
They are easy to pop back in

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought the sunglasses for my bachelorette party and I cabin for the weekend. All the girls absolutely loved it. The shape of the classes fit everybody’s facial structure perfectly. They are dark so it worked perfect with the snow. I highly recommend these glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Ddanielle

customer_reviews.title: Great for if you break a lot of sunglasses.
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews I thought these were gonna be garbage-- and I still decided to buy them. I was surprised to find out they're actually way better than I was expecting. Don't get me wrong, they're still low quality-- but they're significantly better than you'd think. If you break a lot of sunglasses, definitely go for these. I have a toddler who loves tearing sunglasses apart and these are perfect, I just grab another one from the box and throw the old ones in the trash. They're fully capable of working as every day sunglasses, not just gags for a single evening or something. They are a little small on my adult male head, but not uncomfortably so.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Payne

customer_reviews.title: Great party favors and regular sunglasses!
customer_reviews.text: These made great party favors for a secret agent party we threw my 7 year old daughter. We used these sunglasses in the goody bags and they worked well for kids ages 5 - 10. These glasses look very sleek - more like regular stylish sunglasses vs cheap party favor sunglasses. They work well outdoors as well. I would definitely consider using these as every day sunglasses. I think they would fit most adults as well. Definitely worth purchasing!
customer_reviews.author: Prime Queen

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: These are extremely poor quality. Some of them have melted plastic. They're definitely smaller than actual Wayfarers, and the sides of the rims are covered in hard tiny specks of plastic that hurt your ears. I buy crappy sunglasses all the time, but these are the worst pair I've ever been stuck with. Don't buy these.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: These are definitely good for party favors but dont just put them into the bag without taking them out and cleaning the dried up glue and popping in the lenses that arent really in the place they should be ! Dangerous for kids. but once you take care of all of that their good !
customer_reviews.author: R34

customer_reviews.title: Really cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: I know, if you bought a 12 pack of sunglasses for $1 each you should know they're cheap, right? That said, I bought these because I finally lost all the various pairs of plastic sunglasses with random company logos I picked up for free over the years, thinking these would be basically the same thing but unbranded. Unfortunately, these are considerably thinner and flimsier. Probably still worth $1 a pair, though.
customer_reviews.author: Dave B

customer_reviews.title: Great for parties, but lenses pop out easily
customer_reviews.text: I got these cute sunglasses for a Bachelorette party bag. I loved that they came in bulk for a good price. Most of the glasses had at least 1 lens pop out, but they easily pop back in. Just be careful with them. Even though the lenses kept popping out, the girls still loved them and wore them all night long (even though they were meant for the next morning!).
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Braboy

customer_reviews.title: INCREDIBLE VALUE!
customer_reviews.text: Given the price of this 12-pack of glasses, I was expecting cheap "party favor" quality glasses, which was fine as that's all I willing to spend. However, I was shocked when they arrive and were much higher quality glasses! Can't believe the value! Grab these, even if you're only looking for a few .... worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Jen5367

customer_reviews.title: Love them!!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! Sturdy, great shape for my face, lightweight, decent tint, and amazing value! I’m always losing my sunglasses at the beach, on the boat or out and about. At this price I can afford to lose a pair and not cry over them.
customer_reviews.author: Jaylee

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality! Lenses came already damaged.
customer_reviews.text: Much smaller than it looks. Very flimsy and very poor quality. All of the glasses came with scratches all over the lenses. The chrome plastic pieces in the corner of the glasses all popped off. I bought this as a fun goody bag gift for a bridal party and I couldn't even use them.
customer_reviews.author: Christine N

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the kiddos at birthday party!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for the boys to wear at my 16 year old’s birthday party.... the boys thought they were the shizzz! I still find a couple pairs around the house, so yes, pretty sturdy, can’t seem to get rid of them! :)
customer_reviews.author: Stiles Smiles

customer_reviews.title: the quality is not the best. I'll will bought it again if is for ...
customer_reviews.text: they are cheap material, but is ok for a kids party. the quality is not the best. I'll will bought it again if is for a kids event. I boughted fot my BF birthday and it wasn't what I expected
customer_reviews.author: Angie Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Seem great
customer_reviews.text: I've looked at a few of the pairs in the box, and they seem great. There is some raised writing on the inside, right at the ear on one of the arms...and I can see how that might bother some people.
customer_reviews.author: still wondering

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a husband who constantly loses glasses
customer_reviews.text: My husband loses sunglasses left and right. These are normal “ray ban” type that my husband usually gravitates towards. Work just fine and now I don’t feel bad if he misplaced them!
customer_reviews.author: Holley

customer_reviews.title: If you lose or scratch sunglasses easily, these are for you.
customer_reviews.text: A box of sunglasses for about $10? Yes please! They are as good as any $10 pair at a big box store. If you are rough with your shades, these are a great deal. If you are looking for a box of high quality glass lenses, you are shopping in the wrong area.
customer_reviews.author: Jason strong

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: Whether your a kid or grown-up these worked great for our Grinch Escape Rooms! The kids loved dressing up as secret agents! These also say they protect from UV so that's awesome! I would definitely order again!
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: MF's slice your ears open like no bodies business
customer_reviews.text: MF's slice your ears open like no bodies business. I would have returned them but I forgot and just ended up recycling them. Watch out for these suckers. They hurt. They were also all scratched up. You get what you pay for?
customer_reviews.author: SunshineRainbows

customer_reviews.title: Great cheap sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: I now have 10 pairs of sunglasses to use and leave a pair in the car and atv. They are pretty good for the price and you don't worry about losing a pair. Have not broken a pair yet.
customer_reviews.author: William Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Shades
customer_reviews.text: I know you get what you pay for but these were horrible. The plastic was very cheap and the lenses were all scratched up. I ended up going to the local dollar store and finding some better than these. Maybe I just got a bad batch.
customer_reviews.author: L.H.

customer_reviews.title: Classic , great favor
customer_reviews.text: Well, the life of these glasses with ten year old boys was not long. However, adult holders left with them intact. Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome party favors
customer_reviews.text: These are the cutest little sunglasses! Don’t feel cheap at all! I bought them for my sons mission impossible themed birthday party and the kids all loved them!!! They are really nice and would definitely buy them again!!!
customer_reviews.author: KyKy

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price, better quality than I had anticipated. I've bought $10 sunglasses from Walmart that were worse than even the jankiest pair in this box.
customer_reviews.author: MCB

customer_reviews.title: STAY FAR AWAY
customer_reviews.text: Won't buy again. Most of the glassed showed up with cracked lenses. All the lenses were scratched. They basically looked "used". Avoid this item like the plague.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Case

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price!!
customer_reviews.text: For the price, these cheap sunglasses are nice. We used them for a prank, but everyone kept them to actually use. Good for cheap sunglasses.
customer_reviews.author: GWendolyn

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: The kids loved them. I put them in the treat box for my sons Baby Boss Party and it went so well with the theme. Great product for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. A&W

customer_reviews.title: Great Value Price
customer_reviews.text: These were a great price for the quantity I received. I ordered these for my wedding party for my wedding. I will be buying another pack again.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: I’m terrible at losing sunglasses so I bought a 12 pack. They work as you’d expect . Nice product for the money
customer_reviews.author: Kawa

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievable deal. Quite well built, look great, and for basically about a buck apiece. We keep multiples by the pool for guests.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Spatz

customer_reviews.title: Cheap!!!
customer_reviews.text: Please pay attention to the poor reviews. I did not and am sorry I did not. The glasses appear fine when you first open the box. Upon taking them out of the box, three of the glasses already had the lenses broken out. I needed them for a party I was having that evening. What a big disappointment. Save your money or spend a bit more and get a decent product.
customer_reviews.author: VMH

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for preschool graduates!
customer_reviews.text: Inexpensive but perfect as a preschool graduation gift. The kids and parents all loved having the sunglasses for the graduation photos. I'm glad I had a few extra for the brothers and sisters of the graduates! I also bought an equal number of pouches to hold the glasses.
customer_reviews.author: John Thomas

customer_reviews.title: cute and cheap
customer_reviews.text: these were a great buy. i bought these as a prop for a dance. the material is not the best but they were a great prop. loved them.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I used them for my son's celebration of life I wrote on the side of them.

customer_reviews.title: Worked for us!
customer_reviews.text: Really great value for the money - used as son’s party favors for both adults and kids!

customer_reviews.title: Yup, good buy.
customer_reviews.text: Great material. Got them for my wedding. It was great.

customer_reviews.title: Nice emergency sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for emergency sunglasses by the pool. They all come individually wrapped so they are scratch free. Seem comfortable. Can’t wait to use them poolside! Come on summer...I’m waiting.

I did notice that some glasses were a bit wonky some where scratched. I would order with enough time to check them out and return or exchange if needed.

customer_reviews.title: I wish the packages would come without looking like they've been trampled
customer_reviews.text: The glasses were exactly what I needed for a theater production. However, if USPS is going to continue to deliver for you, I wish the packages would come without looking like they've been trampled. This is the third delivery that has been damaged. So far none of the product has been affected - but sooner or later it will.
